div.style: background-image: url("/UserFiles/Servers/Server_419503/Image/COVID19/Copy of CORONAVIRUS_ COVID-19 School Closure Resources.png");

div.a: Learn More about School Closure Resources

h3.a: Read more about Continued Remote Learning

div.p: Access everything you need for Continued Remote Learning here! This includes links to elementary weekly instruction packets, secondary learning information and technology support.
We have gathered Information and will keep you updated on the latest from Kitsap Health District (KPHD), Washington State Department of Health (DOH) and the Centers for Disease Control (CDC).

h3.a: Read more about Emergency Meal Service Available Monday Through Friday

div.p: North Kitsap School District provides grab and go meals for all NKSD students Monday through Friday from 11am - 12:30pm for the duration of the school closures. Meals are free to every NKSD student. Registration is not required and there are no forms to fill out. Click the title for locations and Information.

Thanks to our community partners, childcare is currently being offered at Poulsbo Elementary by Martha and Mary, and at The Village Green Community Center in Kingston by Boys and Girls Club. Learn more!

h3.a: Read more about Online Check-in is Open for 2020-2021

div.p: Is your student returning for the 2020-2021 school year? It's time to get them checked in! Visit Skyward Family Access to start the process today.

h3.a: Read more about Online registration is open for the class of 2033!

div.p: Online registration is now open for the class of 2033!

div.p: We are ALL in for ALL students. Learn about our new Strategic Plan and our vision for every student in North Kitsap.
Looking for an individualized K-12 learning environment? Choice Academy has excellent programs!

a.title: Our Graduation Rate is on the rise!!

div.h3: Our Graduation Rate is on the rise!!
div.p: Over the past four years, grad rates have increased 9%. Last year we reached 94%!!
